comment:
* An entity class that is used to pass information to an online DRM server. An instance of this
 * class is passed to the {@link DrmManagerClient#acquireDrmInfo acquireDrmInfo()} method to get an
 * instance of a {@link DrmInfo}.
 *
 * @deprecated Please use {@link android.media.MediaDrm}

variables.name: TYPE_UNREGISTRATION_INFO
variables.comment: * Acquires information for unregistering the DRM server.

variables.name: TYPE_RIGHTS_ACQUISITION_PROGRESS_INFO
variables.comment: * Acquires the progress of the rights acquisition.

variables.name: ACCOUNT_ID
variables.comment: * Key that is used to pass the unique session ID for the account or the user.

variables.name: SUBSCRIPTION_ID
variables.comment: * Key that is used to pass the unique session ID for the subscription.

methods.name: public String getMimeType()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the MIME type associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The MIME type.

methods.name: public int getInfoType()
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the information type associated with this object.
     *
     * @return The information type.

methods.name: public void put(String key, Object value)
methods.comment:
* Adds optional information as key-value pairs to this object.
     *
     * @param key The key to add.
     * @param value The value to add.

methods.name: public Object get(String key)
methods.comment:
* Retrieves the value of a given key.
     *
     * @param key The key whose value is being retrieved.
     *
     * @return The value of the key that is being retrieved. Returns null if the key cannot be
     * found.

methods.name: public Iterator<String> keyIterator()
methods.comment: * Retrieves an iterator object that you can use to iterate over the keys associated with * this DrmInfoRequest object. * * @return The iterator object.

methods.name: public Iterator<Object> iterator()
methods.comment: * Retrieves an iterator object that you can use to iterate over the values associated with * this DrmInfoRequest object. * * @return The iterator object.

methods.name: boolean isValid()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this instance is valid or not
     *
     * @return
     *     true if valid
     *     false if invalid

methodNames: public void put(String key, Object value)
